sen.j: 上桂駅（かみかつらえき）は、京都市西京区にある、阪急電鉄阪急嵐山線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: Kamikatsura Station is a station of the Hankyu Arashiyama Line of the Hankyu Railway in Nichikyo Ward, Kyoto City.
Kamikatsura Station is a station of the Hankyu Arashiyama Line of the Hankyu Railway in Nichikyo Ward, Kyoto City.
Katsura Station, located in Nishikyo Ward, Kyoto City, is a stop on the Hankyu Arashiyama Line, which is operated by the Hankyu Railway.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。表現を他ファイルと統一しました。

sen.j: 相対式2面2線のホームを持つ、交換設備を備えた地上駅。
sen.e: The station is above the ground with exchange equipment and separate platforms with two sides and two railway lines.
The station is above the ground with exchange equipment and separate platforms with two sides and two railway lines.
An aboveground station with two separate platforms serving two tracks, Kamikatsura Station has a passing loop that enables trains running in opposing directions to pass each other.
sen.cmt: 「交換施設」とは、行き先が逆の鉄道がすれ違える施設 のことではないかと解釈し、左記のようにいたしました。ご確認下さい。NR: "Passing facility" seems very vague to me. I assume it means "passing loop".

sen.j: 駅舎（改札口）は桂行ホーム嵐山寄りにあり、反対側の嵐山行ホームへは地下道で連絡している。
sen.e: The station hall (ticket wicket) is in the direction of Arashiyama Station on the platform for trains bound for the Katsura Station and is connected with a subway passage to the platform for trains bound for Arashiyama Station on the opposite side.

The station hall (ticket wicket) is in the direction of Arashiyama Station on the platform for trains bound for Katsura Station, and is connected with a subway passage to the platform for trains bound for Arashiyama Station on the opposite side.

The station building (ticket gate) is in the direction of Arashiyama Station of the platform for trains bound for Katsura, and is connected with a underground passage to the platform for trains bound for Arashiyama on the opposite side.
sen.cmt: 駅舎→staiton building 地下道→underground passage と統一しました。

sen.j: ※のりば番号は設定されていない。
sen.cmt: 他ファイルと統一しました。
他ファイルと統一しました。
meters の前にスペースを追加しました。
国道→National Route としました。

sen.e: In front of the Kamikatsura Station

sen.j: 69系統：（四条大宮経由）二条駅行
sen.e: Route 69: Bound for Nijo Sta. via Shijo Omiya
Route 69: Bound for Nijo Station via Shijo Omiya
Route 69: Bound for Nijo Station via Shijo Omiya
Route 69: Bound for Katsura Sta. via Mozume
Route 69: Bound for Katsura Station via Mozume
Route 69: Bound for Katsura Station via Mozume

sen.cmt: 他ファイルと統一しました。

sen.j: 平成15年度の1日あたりの乗車人員は約4,312人（京都府統計書より）。
sen.e: According to the statistics of Kyoto Prefecture, the number of passangers per day in fiscal 2003 was about 4,312.
According to the statistics of Kyoto Prefecture, the number of passengers per day in fiscal 2003 was approximately 4,312.
The number of passengers per day in fiscal year 2003 was approximately 4,312 (according to the Kyoto Prefecture Statistics Report).
sen.cmt: 他ファイルと統一しました。fiscal → fiscal yearに変更しました。

sen.j: 1928年（昭和3年）11月9日 新京阪鉄道嵐山線開通と同時に開業。
sen.e: On November 9th 1928, the Station began its operation at the same time as the Shinkeihan Railway Arashiyama Line.
November 9, 1928: The station went into operation concurrently with the Shinkeihan Railway Arashiyama Line.
November 9, 1928: The station went into operation concurrently with the Shinkeihan Railway Arashiyama Line.

sen.j: 1930年（昭和5年）9月15日 会社合併により京阪電気鉄道の駅となる。
sen.e: On September 15th 1930, due to company mergers, it became a station of Keihan Electric Railway.
September 15, 1930: It became a station of Keihan Electric Railway due to company mergers.
On September 15, 1930, it became a station of Keihan Electric Railway as a result of amalgamation.
sen.cmt: 会社合併→as a result of amalgamation として統一しました。

sen.j: 1943年（昭和18年）10月1日 会社合併により京阪神急行電鉄（現在の阪急電鉄）の駅となる。
sen.e: On October 1st 1943, due to company mergers, it became a station of Keihanshin Express Railway (the current Hankyu Railway),
October 1, 1943: Due to company mergers, it became a station of Keihanshin Express Railway (the current Hankyu Railway) due to company mergers.
On October 1, 1943, it became a station of Keihanshin Express Railway (the current Hankyu Railway) as a result of amalgamation.
sen.cmt: 会社合併→as a result of amalgamation として統一しました。ダブりを削除しました。

sen.j: 1944年（昭和19年）1月9日 資材供出のため駅部分を除き全線単線化。
sen.e: In January 9th 1944, except for a part of the station all the lines became single, because of the need to supply materials.
January 9, 1944: All the lines (except for part of the station) became single due to the need to supply materials.
January 9, 1944: All the lines (except for part of the station) became single due to the need to supply materials.
It became a station where two trains could pass each other.
It became a station where two trains could pass each other.
It became a station where two trains could pass each other.

sen.cmt: 他ファイルと統一しました。
他ファイルと統一しました。

sen.e: Katsura Station - Kamikatsura Station - Matsuo Station(Kyoto Prefecture)
